SEYMOUR N. SIEGEL
Director
JOHN DE PROSPO
Executive Officer
Dear Harry:
As Sy indicated to you in his telephone conversation with you,
I am unable to attend any meetings of the Radio Program Planning
Sub-committee which may be held in December of this year,
Eecause of my interest in the subject, I guess the only reason
for my not attending would be a commitment as important as a
honeymoon, and right now I can't think of anything more important.
I hope you will keep me posted on developments, and if there
should be a change in plans for a meeting before November 27, or
after the first of the year, please let me know.
With all best wishes, I am.
Cordially yours.
Bernard R. Buck
Program Director
